The sound on this file is poor so I downloaded the audio(1.17gb) from (Hanna.2011.BluRay.1080p.AVC.DTS-HD.MA5.1-CHDBits) and used mkvmerge to add it and remove the others. The only problem is the audio is out of sync so you need to type in the box (Delay (in ms) ) 5400 which  will bring it back in line. If you have a fast download speed then I guess you would download another file, I have a slow connection so it was quicker for me to download the audio than another large file. Hope this helps somebody with slow connections.
ignore my comment above its still out of sync a bit
